meanings.sent1: I like apples, als I enjoy bananas.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys swimming, als she loves hiking.
meanings.sent3: He brought his guitar to the party, als he also brought his harmonica.
meanings.sent4: The sun was shining brightly, als the moon was visible in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The teacher not only teaches math, als she also teaches science.

meanings.sent1: She likes to sing, als she dances well.
meanings.sent2: He is good at basketball, als he plays soccer as well.
meanings.sent3: The cat enjoys sleeping, als it plays with toys as well.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloom beautifully, als the trees sway in the wind as well.
meanings.sent5: He not only reads books, als he writes stories as well.

meanings.sent1: I have a dog, als I have a cat in addition.
meanings.sent2: She bought a dress, als she purchased shoes in addition.
meanings.sent3: He finished his homework, als he cleaned his room in addition.
meanings.sent4: The cake was delicious, als the ice cream was tasty in addition.
meanings.sent5: She not only studies English, als she learns French in addition.
